sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ jiànyì nǐ duō xiūxi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je te conseille de te reposer davantage.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I suggest you rest more.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài yī jiā yánjiūsuǒ gōngzuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle travaille dans un institut de recherche.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She works at a research institute.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā dǎzì hěn shúliàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle tape très bien au clavier.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She types very skillfully.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gōngsī fābù le xīn chǎnpǐn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entreprise a lancé un nouveau produit.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company released a new product.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qìxiàngtái yùbào míngtiān yǒu yǔ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La station météorologique prévoit de la pluie pour demain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The weather station forecasts rain tomorrow.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā mǎi le yī tái shùmǎ xiàngjī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a acheté un appareil photo numérique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He bought a digital camera.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Rénlèi yǐjīng dēngshàng le yuèqiú.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'humanité a déjà marché sur la Lune.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Humans have already landed on the moon.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā xiàng wǒ zhāoshǒu dǎ zhāohu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle m'a fait signe de la main pour me saluer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She waved to greet me.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiàn shì wǒ bù néng bù guǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je ne peux pas ignorer cette affaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I can't help but get involved in this matter.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 去也好，不去也好，你自己决定。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qù yě hǎo, bù qù yě hǎo, nǐ zìjǐ juédìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Que tu y ailles ou non, c'est à toi de décider.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Whether you go or not, you decide for yourself.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jǐngchá páichú le tā de xiányí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La police a écarté les soupçons qui pesaient sur lui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The police ruled him out as a suspect.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jiàoliàn zhǐdǎo duìyuán xùnliàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entraîneur guide l'entraînement des joueurs.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The coach guides the players' training.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 每个人都应该遵守交通规则。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Měi gè rén dōu yīnggāi zūnshǒu jiāotōng guīzé.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tout le monde devrait respecter le code de la route.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Everyone should obey traffic rules.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de shēncái hěn miáotiáo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle a une silhouette très élancée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She has a very slim figure.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā duì pīpíng hěn mǐngǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est très sensible aux critiques.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is very sensitive to criticism.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这家工厂有先进的设备。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiā gōngchǎng yǒu xiānjìn de shèbèi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette usine dispose d'équipements avancés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This factory has advanced equipment.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Lǐbàitiān wǒmen qù gōngyuán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Dimanche, nous allons au parc.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: On Sunday we go to the park.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这件衣服的样式很时尚。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiàn yīfu de yàngshì hěn shíshàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le style de ce vêtement est très tendance.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The style of this clothing is very fashionable.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bìmùshì jiāng zài zhōurì jǔxíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La cérémonie de clôture aura lieu dimanche.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The closing ceremony will be held on Sunday.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我有空闲的时候喜欢看书。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ yǒu kòngxián de shíhou xǐhuan kànshū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime lire quand j'ai du temps libre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like to read when I have free time.
